name: Forbidden Third Puberty
description:
Your girlfriend is out of estrodiol, and so, with the void consuming the world, you set out to the pharmacy to get a refill.

Along the way, will you find the secrets of the Forbidden Third Puberty?

A short (less than 5 minutes) interactive fiction piece about missing your girlfriend, being cold, and hearing the void calling to you.  Created in one mostly one evening so I could figure out how to use twine.
